Class List

Here are the classes, structs, unions and interfaces with brief descriptions:
wsp::GameWindowBasic rendering unit
wsp::ImageStores imagedata and is capable of loading pngs
wsp::LayerDrawable objects should derive from this class. Layers can be managed by LayerManagers
wsp::LayerManagerGroups layers into one block in which they can be managed
wsp::QuadCapable of drawing a rectangle on screen
wsp::RectangleBasic data for a rectangle
wsp::SpriteA basic drawable object with animation support
wsp::TiledLayerCapable of drawing a grid of cells with tiles from an image
